java-taxii

Java library for TAXII.

This library provides:

  • A Java object representation of TAXII Messages using JAXB.
  • Serialization, deserialization, and validation of TAXII Messages.
  • An HTTP/HTTPS TAXII Client using Apache's HTTP Components.

Downloads

Downloads of java-taxii are hosted on GitHub.

Download java-taxii-1.0.0.zip

Source Code

java-taxii development occurs on GitHub.

Sample Clients

  • Sample Clients - A standalone .jar file (does not require java-taxii separately), and associated shell/batch scripts for communicating with TAXII servers.
